creditline: Gift of Richard J. and Helen Lynch Cashman
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: large saucer dish with wide ring foot; white blue overall scrolling blue lotus design
inscription:
Inscription, Tag and Sticker

on bottom, in blue: six-character inscription
markings: on bottom, on stickers: [CHAIT GALLERIES / K\'ang Hsi Period / 1662-1722 A.D. / NEW YORK] and [#3 Antique / Porcelain / pr. chargers]; on bottom: MIA loan tag
title: Charger, one of a pair
